topics.title: [Troll post] ZERONET IS NOTHING BUT A JS SHIT
topics.body:
~~IT CAN NEVER BE USED FOR DARKNET STUFF~~

This username was logged in http://zero.shaknaisrael.com:43110.  I'm not sure if it was the owner of the juicicoo account that posted this or someone else using his proxy.  Either way, there should be a log out button :)

topics.title: ZN sucks like hell cuz it needs 2 run JS.

1@13.body: Decentralized Wiki/Site directory with voting on the links/contents!

3@2.body:
Thanks nofish! 
Are user ids on zerotalk permanent (multiple users with same I'd possible?)? Is a reset available? Does my IP link to the user name? A possible privacy/anon concern? If it is linked to my IP, could it be transferred over to be used from another IP?
Another thing, would a file upload site be viable? Perhaps as a distributed Dropbox/cloud (private or public) solution or something?
Is there something that can be done to improve the proxy usage? ie clicking on a localhost link while using the zeroproxy leads to the localhost link, instead of being proxied.

Thanks for the responses guys!

Interestingly enough, I guess that btc address is stored on the proxy server for me. I suppose resetting the name is as easy as deleting the file? I'm interested in the sc for the proxy now.. Time to dig in.

2@20.body:
and I can only imagine what this jerk means when he says 'darknet stuff' .
btw did the owner of this proxy intentionally leave himself logged into the forum ??

5@2.body:
> [nofish](#comment_17_2): Topics now also ordered by creation time.

Could there be an option chose sorting? By either creation date, last post, number of comments? And possibly a pinging feature so someone knows when they are responded to.

3@20.body:
Didn't know I only need 2 add the /media in front of the address. L0L

Perhaps you guys can learn something from the decentralized Tox which can be easily torified via Tor's TCP.

BTW, it seems I also need 2 add /index.html at the end of the address.

U guys rock really. ZN is absolutely a huge deal 2 the future of Darknet that needs 2 be decentralized than ever. Especially after the recent Evolution admins' exit scam shit..

Once ZN is able 2 be torified (e.g. run on Tails), lots of things will never be the same.
Bitmessage can be torified as well. I've managed 2 run both of Bitmessage & Tox on Tails/Whonix.
